titles.title: A bill to extinguish Federal court jurisdiction to require attendance at a particular school of any student because of race, color, creed, or sex.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Eliminates Federal court jurisdiction to require a student to attend a particular school because of race, creed, color, or sex.
